website_summaries.verdict: A good buy if you are looking for lightweight swaddles at a good price. Otherwise, the SwaddleMe set slightly edges them out on quality and price.
pros: Combines easy-to-secure Velcro, soft material, and a universal fit
Comes in a pack of 3 with a no-questions-asked, money-back guarantee
cons: The breathable material is ideal for warm weather, but might be too thin for colder months

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use especially late at night when sleep deprived
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use especially late at night when sleep deprived. Also, the legs have enough wiggle room when swaddled so that my concerns are put at ease regarding hip displasia which can occur when blanket swaddling too tightly. On the flip side, I am not worried that the swaddle will come undone as my baby sleeps as it could with blanket swaddling when done too loosely, since the velcro holds everything together nicely. Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great product and company.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I ordered this for our latest grandson who arrived quite well on March 29. I have not used this product but looking it over it is a unique design and very well made. I expect he will outgrow them and they will be in great shape for the next one. I highly recommend this company as they shipped promptly and the product was as advertised. Great job and kudos to Ziggy Baby!
customer_reviews.author: John43

customer_reviews.text: My 7 week old son currently uses these and they work perfectly. He enjoys being swaddled but it's warm out due to it being summertime, so the lightweight material these are made of allow enough breathability to keep him at a comfortable temperature. The size is perfect and the prints are adorable. The velcro has a nice large area to attach to, so you can fit it comfortably to your child. Overall, we're glad we picked these swaddles. I'm planning on ordering more soon!
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bigger newborns!
customer_reviews.text: My son was born at 9lbs and 21 inches! So we were only able to swaddle him with normal blankets for like 2 weeks before he was just too big to stay wrapped properly. I decided to order these to see how they work and I have been pleased with how well they work. Like in other reviews I agree that the velcro is a bit sharp and is very strong, so be careful when swaddling your little one. The material is also thin so baby doesn't get overheated in these warmer months! Hope this helped!
customer_reviews.author: Aja Parker

customer_reviews.title: Mixed thoughts.
customer_reviews.text: Initially, I loved this product! Even better than the swaddleme and summer infant swaddles we had due to the fabric. The swaddles are light fabric and seem more comfortable for the warm weather. However after a few uses the thread holding the Velcro to the fabric broke! Also, the patch where the Velcro was supposed to attach was small and began to lose hold. I was pretty disappointed especially given all the positive reviews. This only happened with one out of the three swaddles, but we've also had them less than a month.
customer_reviews.author: C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: which I imagine would be great in the summer months to swaddle without adding bulk ...
customer_reviews.text: These are a very thin fabric, which I imagine would be great in the summer months to swaddle without adding bulk or warmth. Unfortunately they were a little too short for me 21.5" one-month old so we wound up returning them. His feet were all the way at the bottom but if I let the swaddle be lower on his shoulders the little houdini would worm his way out.
customer_reviews.author: Jessa

customer_reviews.title: Game changer swaddle
customer_reviews.text: Get these for the first 3 months of bringing your little one home and you will not regret it. These swaddles come with a learning curve but are a game changer to swaddling the little one. No more Houdini escapes by the baby who would get every limp out of our perfectly wrapped swaddle. We used these till our baby was about 12 pounds and these were perfect to keep her contained, sleeping longer and manageable. You only need a couple of tries to master these and then they are a whole lot easier to put on that what you learned at the hospital.
customer_reviews.author: Anisha Agarwala

customer_reviews.title: Quality seems good, but sizing needs work
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is good so far (the material is soft, the velcro is strong), but the sizing seems way off. We've had them for a week or so and can't imagine that we'll be able to use them for more than another couple of weeks. They're far more reasonably priced than the competition, but with the sizing the way it is, I still think we would have been better off paying 2-3x the price for Halo.
